AppDB.Name: IN_AC_C_VLAN_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress AC C_VLAN mapping to LIF DB

AppDB.Name: IN_AC_S_VLAN_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress AC S_VLAN mapping to LIF DB

AppDB.Name: IN_AC_S_C_VLAN_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress AC S_VLAN x C_VLAN mapping to LIF DB

AppDB.Name: MPLS_TERMINATION_SINGLE_LABEL_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MPLS label mapping to LIF DB

AppDB.Name: MPLS_TERMINATION_CONTEXT_SPECIFIC_LABEL_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MPLS Context-Specific label mapping to LIF DB. The context for the label lookup is given by the "Extended-FoDO" (24b), which is either the In-LIF or another label (in case of upstream assignment)

AppDB.Name: BIER_BFER_TERM_SUBDOMAIN_ONLY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Lookup {Forwarding-Domain(22b)} in ISEM. The result is the BIER-LIF containing FoDo for IPv4/IPv6/Eth forwarding lookup, and Learn-Information

AppDB.Name: BIER_BFER_TERMINATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Lookup BFIR-ID and FoDo to map LIF. Lookup {BFIR-ID(16b),Forwarding-Domain(22b)} in ISEM. The result is the BIER-LIF containing FoDo for IPv4/IPv6/Eth forwarding lookup, and Learn-Information

AppDB.Name: IPv4_VRF_DIP_TUNNEL_TYPE_TO_LIF_OR_VTEP_IDX
AppDB.OneLineDescription: IPv4 {VRF,DIP,Additional_Header type} (1) tunnel termination, or,(2) VTEP_IDX VTEP IDX is later used in for {SIP, VTEP_IDX} tunnel termination lookups

AppDB.Name: IPV4_TUNNEL_TERMINATION_B
AppDB.OneLineDescription: IPv4 Tunnel Termination TCAM Key:{VRF, DIP, SIP, IPv4_Additional_Header, Next_Layer_Type}

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: AC In-LIF for P2P, standard entry

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: AC In-LIF for Multipoint, standard entry

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: AC In-LIF for P2P, Larger entry

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: AC In-LIF for Multipoint, Larger entry

AppDB.Name: ESEM_OUT_AC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Lookup VD x VSI in the ESEM to detrmine the OutAC

AppDB.Name: EG_VSI_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress VSI Information, Result in this AppDB is hard coded no ARR

AppDB.Name: MPLS_FWD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MPLS ILM table, for MPLS labels which are per Platform assigned

AppDB.Name: MPLS_FWD_PER_IF_UA
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MPLS ILM table, for MPLS labels which per I/F of Upstream assigned

AppDB.Name: MACT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Lookup FID X MAC Address in the MACT to detrmine the destination interface ot interface group

AppDB.Name: MACT_IVL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Lookup {VID,FID} X MAC Address in the MACT to detrmine the destination interface ot interface group

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Destination and Out LIF with statistic.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Destination with MPLS out label with statistic.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Destination and Out LIF with statistic.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Destination with MPLS out label with statistic.

AppDB.Name: IPv6_VRF_DB_TCAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: IPV6 "ACL" in TCAM with result New-VRF. SIP is taken 96msb - in order to fit into less than 320n entry

AppDB.Name: BIER_TI_FORWARD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Lookup BIER header parameters in Lem to resolve Destination (BIFT-Base-Address)

AppDB.Name: ETM_PP_DESCRIPTOR_EXPANSION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Expanding PP-CUD-MC Pointer and PP-CUD-ACL Pointer
